description:
Nanako visits a cable TV station to tape a program. In her changing room, she discovers a suspicious person going through their outfits...!
Recently there have been multiple reports of people stealing clothes from popular idols, but have those people finally come after them?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé d`avoir un manager
We Tried Adding a Manager and Stuff.
マネージャーとかついてみた.
